entry.title: Pittsburgh from the Duquesne Incline
entry.content:
Pittsburgh has seen some absolutely amazing weather this weekend, which all things considered, is quite rare. On Saturday, Kristina and I, along with a couple of friends decided to ride the inclines on Mount Washington. The Monongahela and Duquesne inclines both provide excellent views of the city and if you're a student at Pitt or CMU you get to ride for free. At the top of the Duquesne incline I took a couple of pictures and then pieced together a panorama of the city. I'm fairly pleased with the results, the coloration on the camera is a little off, but not bad for our little point and click camera.

The image is under a Creative Commons By-NonCommercial-ShareAlike license. If you'd like the full resolution image (7430x1326) or to use it for other purposes, email me.
